Views

This module handles the views of the main poll site.

polls.views.detail(request, question_id)[source]

The basic poll entry page

polls.views.index(request)[source]

Brings up the primary list of polls.

polls.views.results(request, question_id)[source]

Displays the results of the poll in question

polls.views.vote(request, question_id)[source]

Displays a poll with the answer options

This file will render the login pages

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

This function authenticates users and redirects them onwards.

user_auth.views.register(request)[source]

This is the form to register a new user.

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]

This function sends the user to the main login page.
